name: One More Cellar
description:
Welcome traveler!
 One more cellar is a top down roguelike with bullet-hell elements in which you have to venture down an endless dungeon.

Every few floors you'll meet the shopkeeper, which will sell you different goods to increase your strength, speed and resilience.

How to play:

MOVEMENTWASDARROW KEYSSHOOTINGLEFT CLICKLEFT CTRLINTERACT E-------
